text: Düsseldorf Baskets was a professional basketball club based in Düsseldorf, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. ==History== The team was formed in 2008, when the Bayer company decided to dramatically decrease its sponsorship for its Bayer Giants Leverkusen. As a result, the Bayer Giants went down to Germany's Regional 1 (4th division) to restructure. The license for the Basketball Bundesliga was transferred to Düsseldorf, who chose to keep the name Giants. The tourism investment of Ozaltin Group, Gloria Hotels & Resorts became the main sponsor of Germany Beko Basketball League’s entrenched team Duesseldorf Giants. The name of the team was changed to "Gloria Giants" for the 2010-11 season. They ended on the 17th place in the 2009–10 season and relegated from the Bundesliga, but Gloria Hotels & Resorts invested more money in the club to get an immediate return to the first tier with a wild-card. The following season the team relegated again. In 2012 the club name was changed to Düsseldorf Baskets. After the 2012/2013 season the license of the team for playing in the second tier league in 2013/2014 was revoked by the league. Due to that the team did not take part in any competition in the 2013/2014 season. In March 2014 the team filed for bankruptcy.https://www.derwesten.de/sport/lokalsport/duesseldorf/aus-fuer-die- duesseldorf-baskets-didin-meldet-insolvenz-an-id9138971.html ==Names== *2008–2010: Düsseldorf Giants *2010–2012: Gloria Giants Düsseldorf *2012–2014: Düsseldorf Baskets ==Results== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:85%" !Season !Tier !League !Pos. !Postseason |- |style="background:#efefef;"| 2008–09 | align="center"|1 | BBL | align="center" style="background: " | 12 | style="background: " | – |- |style="background:#efefef;"| 2009–10 | align="center"|1 | BBL | align="center" style="background:" | 17 | style="background:#ffcccc" | RelegatedClub received a wild-card to avoid relegation. |- |style="background:#efefef;"| 2010–11 | align="center"|1 | BBL | align="center" style="background: ;" | 18 | style="background:#ffcccc" | Relegated |- |style="background:#efefef;"|2011–12 | align="center"|2 | Pro A | align="center" style="background: ;" | 6 | style="background:#ACE1AF" | Semifinalist |- |style="background:#efefef;"|2012–13 | align="center"|2 | Pro A | align="center"| 3 | style="background:silver" | Runner-up |- |} ==Logos== Giants_DUS.jpg |Gloria Giants Düsseldorf ==References== ==External links== *Team profile at eurobasket.com *Official website Category:Basketball clubs in North Rhine-Westphalia Category:Basketball teams established in 2008 Category:Basketball teams disestablished in 2014 Category:Basketball teams in Germany Category:2008 establishments in Germany Category:2014 disestablishments in Germany Category:Sport in Düsseldorf
